assignments.description: Assigns the length of the uploaded file to a variable for decision making
assignments.name: AssignFileUploadLength
assignments.label: AssignFileUploadLength

assignments.description: Assigns the new Request number to a variable for display on the last screen
assignments.name: AssignRequestNumber
assignments.label: AssignRequestNumber

decisions.description: Decides if the Request needs to have a Creative Brief attached. If not, the Request bypasses the file upload screen and goes to the last screen. If yes, the Request will be taken to the file upload screen.
decisions.name: CreativeBriefNeededDecision
decisions.label: CreativeBriefNeededDecision

decisions.description: Decides if the Creative Brief was attached to the Request record. If it, the user will be re-directed back to the file upload screen
decisions.name: CreativeBriefUploaded
decisions.label: CreativeBriefUploaded

decisions.description: Decides which product the Requestor chose to determine which screen to go to next
decisions.name: ProductDecision
decisions.label: ProductDecision

decisions.description: Decides if a Creative team member needs to be notified of a large request
decisions.name: SendLargeRequestEmail
decisions.label: SendLargeRequestEmail

Flow.description: NICC-057703; Screen flow for the Global Creative team to create new Request records

dynamicChoiceSets.description: Populated from the field called “Video Banner Add-Ons” on the custom object called “Request”
dynamicChoiceSets.name: BannerAddOnsPicklistChoiceSet

dynamicChoiceSets.description: Populated from the field called "Digital Request Type" on the custom metadata type "Request Object Pickslist Setup"
dynamicChoiceSets.name: DigitialRequestTypePicklistChoiceSet

dynamicChoiceSets.description: Populated from the picklist field called "GDS Request Type" on the custom metadata type "Request Object Picklist Setup"
dynamicChoiceSets.name: GDSPicklistChoiceSet

dynamicChoiceSets.description: Populated from the picklist field called "GMS Request Type" on the custom metadata type "Request Object Picklist Setup"
dynamicChoiceSets.name: GMSRequestTypePicklistChoiceSet

dynamicChoiceSets.description: Populates from the field called "Product" on the custom metadata type "Request Object Picklist Setup"
dynamicChoiceSets.name: ProductPicklistChoiceSet

dynamicChoiceSets.description: Populated from the field called "Property Type" on the custom object called "Request"
dynamicChoiceSets.name: PropertyTypePicklistChoiceSet

dynamicChoiceSets.description: Populated from the field called “Region” on the custom object called “Request”
dynamicChoiceSets.name: RegionPicklistChoiceSet

dynamicChoiceSets.description: Populated from the field called “RES/iH Request Type” on the custom object called “Request”
dynamicChoiceSets.name: RESiHSubRequestTypePicklistChoiceSet

dynamicChoiceSets.description: Populated from the field "Template" on the Request object
dynamicChoiceSets.name: TemplateChoiceSet

dynamicChoiceSets.description: Populated from the field "Travel Audience/Advertising Request Type" on the custom metadata type "Request Object Picklist Setup"
dynamicChoiceSets.name: TravelAudienceAdvertisingPicklistChoiceSet

dynamicChoiceSets.description: Populated from the field called “Web Request Type” on the custom custom metadata type called “Request Object Picklist Setup”
dynamicChoiceSets.name: WebRequestTypePicklistChoiceSet

formulas.description: Determines the value for the Comments field
formulas.name: formulaComments

formulas.description: Stores the length of the variable "varUploadedFileID"
formulas.name: formulaFileIDLength
formulaMediaRequestType
formulas.expression: IF({!NewCampaignOrUpdateScreenInput} = {!choiceUpdate}, "Update", IF({!ProductInput} = "Digital", {!DigitalTypeScreenInput}, IF({!ProductInput} = "GDS", {!GDSRequestScreenInput}, IF({!ProductInput} = "Travel Audience (TA)", {!TravelAudienceTravelAdvertisingRequestScreenInput}, IF({!ProductInput} = "Travel Advertising", {!TravelAudienceTravelAdvertisingRequestScreenInput}, "")))))

formulas.description: Determines the picklist value for the "Priority" field
formulas.name: formulaPriority

formulas.description: Defines the high level Request type for the Creative Request
formulas.name: formulaRequestType
formulas.expression: IF({!ProductInput} = "Internal Request","Internal Request", IF({!ProductInput} = "GMS", "GMS Request", IF({!ProductInput} = "Digital", "Digital Request", IF({!ProductInput} = "GDS", "GDS Request", IF({!ProductInput} = "Travel Audience (TA)", "Travel Audience Request", IF({!ProductInput} = "Travel Advertising", "Travel Advertising Request", IF({!ProductInput} = "RES/iH", "RES/iH Request", IF({!ProductInput} = "Web", "Web Request", "Breakout" ))))))))

formulas.description: This formula determines which of the 2 "Website URL" fields to pass through to the new Request record. There are 2 screens on which appear a field called "Website URL" and this formula determines which one to use, if applicable.
formulas.name: formulaWebsiteUrl

Flow.label: Request - Creative Team Intake Form

recordLookups.description: Gets the newly created Request record details
recordLookups.name: GetNewRequest
recordLookups.label: GetNewRequest

recordLookups.description: Gets the details of the Queue called "Q-Creative"
recordLookups.name: GetQueue
recordLookups.label: GetQueue

recordLookups.description: Gets the details of the record type called "Creative Requests"
recordLookups.name: GetRecordType
recordLookups.label: GetRecordType

fields.name: CreateRequestFaultScreenText
fields.fieldText:
We are unable to create your Request at this time. Please review the error message below.


{!$Flow.FaultMessage}

fields.name: CreativeBriefMissingDisplayText
fields.fieldText: This Request requires a Creative Brief to be attached. Please click the "Add a Creative Brief" button to be returned to the file upload screen and attach the required document.

screens.description: Page 1 for all Global Creative teams.
screens.name: CreativeFormPage1
screens.label: CreativeFormPage1

fields.name: HaveCreativeBriefScreenInput
fields.fieldText: Do you have the Creative Brief and/or any creative assets to attach?

value.stringValue: Upload Creative Brief and/or Creative Assets

fields.name: ZipMessage
fields.fieldText: Please zip all image assets together prior to uploading.

fields.name: CommonTermsDefined
fields.fieldText:
Common Terms Defined:

Templates – contain placeholder images and lorem-ipsum type 

Emails – contain desired images and copy

fields.name: NumberInput
fields.fieldText: Total number of emails, templates, etc. needed

fields.name: UpdateDisplayText
fields.fieldText: Update (Image swaps or text edits ONLY)﻿

fields.name: AdPilerURLDisplayText
fields.fieldText: ﻿If no design is specified, the Creative team will use the last campaign on file

fields.name: TemplateURLDisplayText
fields.fieldText:
Americas Templates 

International Templates

fields.name: TravelAudienceTravelAdvertisingRequestScreenInput
fields.fieldText: Travel Audience or Travel Advertising Request

fields.name: RequestSuccessDisplayText
fields.fieldText:
Your Request has been created. Click the link below to go to your Request, create a new Request or upload creative assets to Sharepoint.


Request # {!varNewRequestNumber}


Go To Request


Create New Request

rightValue.stringValue: Booking Engine Look and Feel (BE L&F)
Booking Engine Look and Feel (BE L&F)

textTemplates.description: Email template to send large request notification
textTemplates.name: templateLargeRequestEmailTemplate
textTemplates.text:
Dear Melissa,

A large request has been received.

Request Number: {!varNewRequestNumber}

Link to Request record: {!GetNewRequest.Request_URL__c}

Account: {!PropertyLookup.recordName}

Request Type: {!GMSRequestTypeInput}

Number of Items: {!NumberInput}

Thank you.

variables.description: Stores the length of the uploaded file
variables.name: varFileUploadLength
